mapper.select: select count(*) from board where board_type= #{boardType} and status = 'Y'

select board_no, board_title, to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "CREATE_DATE", count, nickname as board_writer from board b, member m where b.mem_no=m.mem_no and board_type=#{boardType} order by board_no desc
select board_no ,board_title ,board_content ,to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" ,count ,board_type from board where status = 'Y' and board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set count = count + 1 where board_no = #{boardNo} and status='Y'
